title: Headless Horseman
summaries: The Headless Horseman is a Hardmode, post-Plantera enemy that starts to spawn beginning with wave 9 of the Pumpkin Moon event. He is an exceptionally dangerous enemy due to his fast speed, high damage, and immunity to knockback. The Horseman's only attack is to charge forward and do a low, quick jump to reach the player. He can fire a pumpkin projectile at the player as well.
Killing a Headless Horseman during the Pumpkin Moon event will add 25 / 50 points to the final score.

statistics.Damage: 130/195/292
statistics.Max Life: 5000/7500/11250
